stadium.name: The Su'akour Bowl
stadium.description: A crude, rowdy stadium built within the half-finished, black-stone walls of the warlord Su'akour's abandoned fortress. The stands are crumbling ruins, and the entire arena perpetually stinks of the nearby sulfur marshes.

stats.pregame_ritual: Kissing their biceps and whispering words of encouragement to them.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Washing their hands with dirt.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.
Asking the referee to bless their weapon.
Finding the muddiest puddle and stomping in it with bare feet.
Staring at a single blade of grass until their eyes water.
Wiping a teammate's sweat onto their own forehead.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Consulting a folk rhyme about the weather to predict the game's outcome.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.

Wiping a teammate's sweat onto their own forehead.
Washing their hands with dirt.
Asking a teammate to tell them a story, but only the beginning.

stadium.name: The Sinking Field
stadium.description: A notoriously poorly-maintained stadium built on reclaimed marshland. The ground is unstable, often waterlogged, and sections of the stands are known to collapse.

stats.pregame_ritual: Seeing who on the team can belch the loudest.
Meditating silently in the corner of the locker room.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Insisting on being the last player to leave the locker room.
Daring a teammate to eat a live worm.
Thanking their armor for the protection it's about to offer.
Counting the number of clouds in the sky.
Tapping each piece of their armor in a specific sequence.
Insisting on being the last player to leave the locker room.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Insisting on being the last player to leave the locker room.
Daring a teammate to eat a live worm.
Counting the number of clouds in the sky.
Tapping each piece of their armor in a specific sequence.
Insisting on being the last player to leave the locker room.
Singing a sea shanty completely out of tune.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è LADIES, GENTLEMEN, AND THINGS FROM THE ABYSS! WELCOME TO TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL! üéôÔ∏è

CAN YOU SMELL THAT? No, it‚Äôs not the rotting carcass of a failed adventurer, it is the SWEET SCENT OF SULFUR! We are live from the crumbling, stink-filled ruins of The Su'akour Bowl for a match that promises to be absolutely **DELICIOUS**! Tonight, my personal favorites, the darkness in my heart, the **EBON GATE CORRUPTORS** are visiting the **BRIMSTONE FIRE EATERS**! üåã

Let me tell you folks, the air here is thick with noxious fumes, or maybe that's just the stench of fear coming off the home team! The Fire Eaters might have the home-field advantage here in the ruins, but can they handle the pure, unadulterated malice of the Corruptors? I DON'T THINK SO! I saw **As Utter** in the locker room earlier, and true to form, he refused to leave until every other soul had departed! That is focus! That is dedication! That is the kind of creepy behavior that wins championships!

And look at the opposition! The Brimstone Fire Eaters! They're backed by the folks over in Eponore. You know, **Sir Tanos**? The guy who hates reading so much he probably eats the playbook instead of studying it? üìúüö´ Their healer, **Raphael Miyasawa**, was seen kissing her own biceps during warm-ups. HA! You're going to need more than self-love to fix the broken bones **Smith Syst** is about to hand out! She's been daring teammates to eat live worms all morning‚Äîshe is READY TO KILL!

So grab your popcorn, grab your ale, and grab a bandage, because **IT'S TROLLBALL TIME!** üëπüèà
postGame:
# üèÅ FINAL REPORT: DOMINATION! DESTRUCTION! VICTORY! üèÅ

**FINAL SCORE: EBON GATE CORRUPTORS 3 - BRIMSTONE FIRE EATERS 0**

HAHAHA! YES! IN YOUR FACE, HEROES! What a glorious night for the wicked! The Ebon Gate Corruptors walked into that sulfur-choked pit and absolutely **SHUT OUT** the home team! A big, fat GOOSE EGG for the Fire Eaters! ü•öüö´ It wasn't just a win, folks; it was a dismantling! A masterclass in pain provided by yours truly's favorite squad!

Let's break down this massacre! The game started with some back-and-forth struggling in the mud. **Olnek Vizzone** got things moving for us, but oh, the tragedy early on! **Wylde Jutta** of the Fire Eaters managed to tackle **Bullion Iglesias** and sent them packing with an injury! A cheap shot if I ever saw one! But did that stop the Corruptors? ABSOLUTELY NOT! It only made them ANGRY!

The momentum shifted when the Fire Eaters' **Campball Fink** tried to get cute with a pass. Bad idea, Fink! **Judi Carrington** was there like a hawk on a field mouse, INTERCEPTING that ball and turning the tide! ü¶Ö That is what we call situational awareness, folks! Something **Sir Artorias** knows nothing about when he's too busy signing autographs!

Then the bodies started hitting the floor! **As Utter**, the man, the myth, the last-one-out-of-the-locker-room, absolutely leveled **Glassman Solley**, sending them to the shadow realm! Then **Orlina Jerrine** took out our boy Vizzone, but **Campball Fink** took out **Napoleon Anzovin**! It was a bloodbath! But amidst the chaos, a star was born!

**ELLETTE PAZ!** REMEMBER THE NAME! üåü With the field littered with bodies, Paz grabbed that leather troll head, sprinted into the End Zone, and **DUNKED THE BALL INTO THE GOAL!** TOUCHDOWN CORRUPTORS! 1-0! The crowd... well, the crowd was mostly Brimstone fans, so they were silent, BUT I WAS SCREAMING!

We went into Halftime feeling good, and the healers did their work. But the second half? The second half was a CLINIC. **Amedeo Bari** decided running was too much work and launched a shot from the Away Field. It sailed through the air, beautiful and true, and **SCORED!** A 2-point shoot to bring the lead to 3-0! BOOM! üí•

The Fire Eaters tried to rally. **Oona Jane** tried to make plays, but the Corruptor defense was a STONE WALL. **Amedeo Bari** wasn't done; after scoring, he tackled **Nigel Rothmuller** and INJURED THEM! Then **Smith Syst** took revenge on **Campball Fink** and sent them to the infirmary! AN EYE FOR AN EYE!

But the MVP of violence in the second half? **AHASUERUS AN!** She went on a rampage! She tackled **Oona Jane**‚ÄîINJURY! She tackled **Glassman Solley** (who had just come back!)‚ÄîINJURY! She was handing out concussions like they were party favors! üéÅü§ï

Even in the dying moments, the Corruptors kept the pressure on. **Ellette Paz** put the final nail in the coffin by injuring **Wylde Jutta**. The Fire Eaters were broken, battered, and beaten. Their passing game was a joke, their defense was Swiss cheese, and their spirits are crushed!

So take that back to Eponore! Tell **Sir Tanos** his team fights like a wet paper bag! Tell **Morgwae** he can't magic his way out of this loss! The Ebon Gate Corruptors reign supreme! THE EVIL HAS LANDED! GOODNIGHT, OSTERRA! üåôüòà
